doc.field: Folder 10 contains audiovisual material: 2 audiotape reels, attached : analog; 1 3/4 in., 1/4 in. tape. On envelope container: "Larsen ____ late 3 May 67."

Folder 14 on Interviews contains audiovisual material: 1 audiotape reel : analog, 1 7/8 ips; 5 in., 1/4 in. tape. On container label: "July 13 '65; Conversation with Ray Larsen and R.T. Elson; Le manuscript #1; Recordreel at 1 7/8"; transcribed - 11/12/65- C Sugarman"
Folder 15 on Interviews contains audiovisual material: 1 audiotape reel : analog (60 min.), 3 3/4 ips; 7 in., 1/4 in. tape. Contains 1 track that was recorded on 8/28/56.
1 audiotape reel : analog (90 min.), 3 3/4 ips; 7 in., 1/4 in. tape. Contains 2 tracks that were recorded on 7/29/57. On container side: "Larsen, R.E. - Reminiscences Tapes 7/29/57".
Folder 16 on Interviews contains audiovisual material:
1 audiotape reel : analog (60 min.), 3 3/4 ips; 7 in., 1/4 in. tape. Contains 1 track which was recorded on 7/22/57.
1 audiotape reel : analog, 3 3/4 ips; 7 in., 1/4 in. tape. Contains 1 track which was recorded on 7/3/57.
